description:
Jonouchi squares off against the judicial jerk Big 3 Johnson who takes the Deck Master form of the awesome adjudicator Judge Man!  Judge Man’s Deck Master ability allows Big 3 to clear the courtroom of all of Jonouchi’s monsters with a single pounding of his gavel!  How can Jonouchi defeat a foe who can destroy Jonouchi’s monsters at will?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Deck Master Judge Man no Sabaki
デッキマスタージャッジマンの裁き
